name: ROADBRAWL
description:
I made ROADBRAWL in one night, in 2015.

----------

TWO PLAYERS .    ONE CONTROLLER .    FIGHT !

----------

Use your boost to accelerate and make yourself invincible. Running over your opponent with the boost on makes you win the game !

----------

PLAYER 1

LEFT STICK : Move

LT : Boost

----------

PLAYER 2

RIGHT STICK : Move

RT : Boost
